-- | RESTful API Modeling Language (RAML) library for Haskell
--   
@package raml
@version 0.1.0

module Web.Raml.Types
type Error = String
type Uri = Text
type Path = Text
data RamlProtocol
HTTP :: RamlProtocol
HTTPS :: RamlProtocol
data RamlParameterType
RamlParameterString :: Maybe [Text] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> RamlParameterType
paramEnum :: RamlParameterType -> Maybe [Text]
paramPattern :: RamlParameterType -> Maybe Text
paramMaxLength :: RamlParameterType -> Maybe Int
paramMinLength :: RamlParameterType -> Maybe Int
paramExampleS :: RamlParameterType -> Maybe Text
paramDefaultS :: RamlParameterType -> Maybe Text
RamlParameterInteger :: Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> RamlParameterType
paramMaximumI :: RamlParameterType -> Maybe Int
paramMinimumI :: RamlParameterType -> Maybe Int
paramExampleI :: RamlParameterType -> Maybe Int
paramDefaultI :: RamlParameterType -> Maybe Int
RamlParameterNumber :: Maybe Double -> Maybe Double -> Maybe Double -> Maybe Double -> RamlParameterType
paramMaximumN :: RamlParameterType -> Maybe Double
paramMinimumN :: RamlParameterType -> Maybe Double
paramExampleN :: RamlParameterType -> Maybe Double
paramDefaultN :: RamlParameterType -> Maybe Double
RamlParameterDate :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> RamlParameterType
paramExampleD :: RamlParameterType -> Maybe Text
paramDefaultD :: RamlParameterType -> Maybe Text
RamlParameterBoolean :: Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> RamlParameterType
paramExampleB :: RamlParameterType -> Maybe Bool
paramDefaultB :: RamlParameterType -> Maybe Bool
RamlParameterFile :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> RamlParameterType
paramExample :: RamlParameterType -> Maybe Text
paramDefault :: RamlParameterType -> Maybe Text
data RamlParameter
RamlParameter :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Bool -> RamlParameterType -> RamlParameter
paramDisplayName :: RamlParameter -> Maybe Text
paramDescription :: RamlParameter -> Maybe Text
paramRepeat :: RamlParameter -> Maybe Bool
paramRequired :: RamlParameter -> Maybe Bool
paramType :: RamlParameter -> RamlParameterType
data RamlTrait
RamlTrait :: RamlTrait
data RamlSecurityScheme
RamlSecurityScheme :: RamlSecurityScheme
data RamlBody
RamlBody :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text RamlParameter) -> RamlBody
bodySchema :: RamlBody -> Maybe Text
bodyExample :: RamlBody -> Maybe Text
bodyFormParameters :: RamlBody -> Maybe (HashMap Text RamlParameter)
data RamlResponse
RamlResponse :: Maybe (HashMap Text RamlBody) -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text RamlParameter) -> RamlResponse
respBody :: RamlResponse -> Maybe (HashMap Text RamlBody)
respDescription :: RamlResponse -> Maybe Text
respHeaders :: RamlResponse -> Maybe (HashMap Text RamlParameter)
data RamlMethod
RamlMethod :: Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text RamlParameter) -> Maybe [RamlProtocol] -> Maybe (HashMap Text RamlParameter) -> Maybe (HashMap Text RamlBody) -> Maybe (HashMap Text RamlResponse) -> Maybe [RamlTrait] -> RamlMethod
methDescription :: RamlMethod -> Maybe Text
methHeaders :: RamlMethod -> Maybe (HashMap Text RamlParameter)
methProtocols :: RamlMethod -> Maybe [RamlProtocol]
methQueryParameters :: RamlMethod -> Maybe (HashMap Text RamlParameter)
methBody :: RamlMethod -> Maybe (HashMap Text RamlBody)
methResponses :: RamlMethod -> Maybe (HashMap Text RamlResponse)
methIs :: RamlMethod -> Maybe [RamlTrait]
data RamlResource
RamlResource :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text RamlParameter) -> Maybe (HashMap Text RamlParameter) -> Maybe RamlMethod -> Maybe RamlMethod -> Maybe RamlMethod -> Maybe RamlMethod -> HashMap Path RamlResource -> Maybe [RamlTrait] -> RamlResource
resDisplayName :: RamlResource -> Maybe Text
resDescription :: RamlResource -> Maybe Text
resUriParameters :: RamlResource -> Maybe (HashMap Text RamlParameter)
resBaseUriParameters :: RamlResource -> Maybe (HashMap Text RamlParameter)
resPost :: RamlResource -> Maybe RamlMethod
resGet :: RamlResource -> Maybe RamlMethod
resPut :: RamlResource -> Maybe RamlMethod
resDelete :: RamlResource -> Maybe RamlMethod
resResources :: RamlResource -> HashMap Path RamlResource
resIs :: RamlResource -> Maybe [RamlTrait]
data RamlDocumentation
RamlDocumentation :: Text -> Text -> RamlDocumentation
docTitle :: RamlDocumentation -> Text
docContent :: RamlDocumentation -> Text
data Raml
Raml :: Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Uri -> Maybe (HashMap Text RamlParameter) -> Maybe [RamlProtocol] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe [RamlDocumentation] -> HashMap Path RamlResource -> Raml
ramlTitle :: Raml -> Text
ramlVersion :: Raml -> Maybe Text
ramlBaseUri :: Raml -> Maybe Uri
baseUriParameters :: Raml -> Maybe (HashMap Text RamlParameter)
ramlProtocols :: Raml -> Maybe [RamlProtocol]
ramlMediaType :: Raml -> Maybe Text
ramlDocumentation :: Raml -> Maybe [RamlDocumentation]
ramlResources :: Raml -> HashMap Path RamlResource
instance Show RamlProtocol
instance Eq RamlProtocol
instance Ord RamlProtocol
instance Show RamlParameterType
instance Eq RamlParameterType
instance Show RamlParameter
instance Eq RamlParameter
instance Show RamlTrait
instance Eq RamlTrait
instance Show RamlSecurityScheme
instance Eq RamlSecurityScheme
instance Show RamlBody
instance Eq RamlBody

instance Eq RamlResponse
instance Show RamlMethod
instance Eq RamlMethod
instance Show RamlResource
instance Eq RamlResource
instance Show RamlDocumentation
instance Eq RamlDocumentation
instance Ord RamlDocumentation
instance Show Raml
instance Eq Raml

module Web.Raml

-- | Deserialize a RAML document from a <a>ByteString</a>. If this fails
--   due to incomplete or invalid input, 'Left e' is returned, containing
--   an error message.
decode :: ByteString -> Either Error Raml

-- | Deserialize a RAML document from a file. If this fails due to
--   incomplete or invalid input, 'Left e' is returned, containing an error
--   message.
decodeFile :: String -> IO (Either Error Raml)
instance FromJSON Raml
instance FromJSON RamlDocumentation
instance FromJSON RamlProtocol
instance FromJSON RamlResource
instance FromJSON RamlMethod
instance FromJSON RamlResponse
instance FromJSON RamlBody
instance FromJSON RamlSecurityScheme
instance FromJSON RamlTrait
instance FromJSON RamlParameter
